posts.text:
-SOLD- !!!
Mitsubishi L300 2.0 bensin for sale.
inspection:  2018 !
4x4 and snorkel - ready for diving ;) Free wheels clutch.
Car is on 32" wheels , lifted . Rims powder coated by Pólýhúðun
Register as a fornbíll , insurance around 20.000 isk / year
year: 1990
mileage: ONLY!   115.000 km  !!!  - real mileage , I have a full history.
My plan was to build mini camper , Im not finish yet but inside I already make new floor , bed and some lockers .
Whats new? - leaf springs (cost 80.000 isk) , rear brake hubs , front brakes , front window , cooler... Oils in engine and diffs, filters.
It's little bit rusty but nothing serious , come and take a look.
Price: 400.000 ISK
Robert
